properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Yamba Yamba Yamba
Yaweh Ee,
Yahweh Ee Yamba Yamba
Yaweh Ee,
(Yamba Yamba Yaweh Ee). x2
--------------------
Take Take Take
to our Lord,
To our Lord, Take Take
to our Lord,
(Take Take Take to our Lord). x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Yamba Yamba Yamba
mampa na beto
Yahweh Ee Yamba Yamba
Yahweh Ee. x2
(Yamba Yamba Yaweh Ee)
----------------------
Take Take Take
the bread to our Lord,
To our Lord, Take Take
to our Lord. x2
(Take Take Take to our Lord)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Yamba Yamba Yamba
Vino na beto,
Yahweh Ee Yamba Yamba
Yahweh Ee. x2
(Yamba Yamba Yaweh Ee)
----------------------
Take Take Take
the wine to our Lord,
To our Lord, Take Take
to our Lord. x2
(Take Take Take to our Lord)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Yamba Yamba Yamba
Kisue na beto,
Yahweh Ee Yamba Yamba
Yahweh Ee. x2
(Yamba Yamba Yaweh Ee)
------------------------
Take Take Take
our incense to our Lord.
To our Lord, Take Take
to our Lord. x2
(Take Take Take to our Lord)
